title: BurnHeatmap and AgentPanel components
description:
Create two new frontend components matching the approved prototype at `playground/concept-b-proof.html`.

**Reference the prototype HTML/CSS carefully for all styling decisions.**

## Component 1: BurnHeatmap

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/burn-heatmap.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/burn-heatmap.test.tsx`

A 52-week × 7-day dot grid showing token burn activity. This REPLACES the existing `burn-map.tsx` — do NOT modify that file, create the new one alongside it.

**Props:**
```typescript
interface BurnDay {
  date: string  // ISO date
  tokens: number
}

interface BurnHeatmapProps {
  dailyActivity: BurnDay[]
  stats: {
    daysActive: number
    totalTokens: string  // formatted, e.g. "1.2M"
    activeWeeks: string  // e.g. "46 / 52"
    shipped: string  // e.g. "4 / 5"
  }
}
```

**Key design decisions from prototype:**
- Cells are **dots** (border-radius: 50%), NOT squares — this differentiates from GitHub's contribution graph
- Cell size: 11px × 11px with 3px gap
- 5 intensity levels using the accent color scale:
  - level-0: `surface-secondary` (empty)
  - level-1: `accent-subtle`
  - level-2: `accent-muted`
  - level-3: `accent` at 70% opacity
  - level-4: `accent` full
- Cells scale to 1.4x on hover with 100ms transition
- Container: `surface-elevated` background, 16px border-radius, shadow-sm, 24px padding
- Month labels below grid in mono font, 10px uppercase
- Legend: "Less [5 dots] More" aligned right in the header
- Summary stats bar below grid: 4 stats (Days active, Tokens burned, Active weeks, Shipped) separated by border-top in surface-secondary. Values in mono font 18px, labels in 10px uppercase.
- All colors use CSS custom properties / Tailwind tokens from globals.css

## Component 2: AgentPanel

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/agent-panel.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/agent-panel.test.tsx`

A compact strip showing the builder's agent toolkit, displayed below the heatmap.

**Props:**
```typescript
interface AgentTool {
  name: string  // e.g. "Claude Code"
  capabilities: string  // e.g. "backend, testing"
}

interface AgentPanelProps {
  tools: AgentTool[]
  workflowStyle: string  // e.g. "Pair builder"
  humanRatio: number  // 0-100
}
```

**Key design from prototype:**
- Background: `accent-subtle` with indigo-tinted dot texture: `radial-gradient(circle, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.07) 1px, transparent 1px)` with `background-size: 14px 14px`
- Border-radius: 12px, padding: 20px 24px
- Single row layout (flex, align baseline, gap 32px, flex-wrap)
- Label: "HOW I BUILD" in 10px uppercase, accent color, min-width 70px
- Tools listed horizontally: tool name in 13px font-weight-500, capabilities in 11px ink-tertiary
- Workflow section pushed to the right (margin-left: auto): workflow style text + small ratio bar (60px × 3px) + ratio label in mono
- Ratio bar: ink-tertiary for human portion, accent for AI portion

**Tests must cover:**
- BurnHeatmap: renders correct number of cells (52×7=364), applies intensity classes, renders stats, renders month labels, renders legend
- AgentPanel: renders all tools with capabilities, renders workflow style, renders ratio bar with correct proportions, handles empty tools array gracefully
acceptance_criteria:
- `src/frontend/src/components/features/burn-heatmap.tsx` exists and renders a 52×7 dot grid
- `src/frontend/src/components/features/agent-panel.tsx` exists and renders agent tool strip
- Both components use Tailwind classes mapping to design tokens in globals.css
- Heatmap cells are circles (rounded-full), NOT squares
- Heatmap has 5 intensity levels using accent color scale
- Agent panel has accent-subtle background with dot texture
- Tests exist for both components
- `cd src/frontend && npx vitest run` passes
- `cd src/frontend && npx eslint .` passes
- `cd src/frontend && npx tsc --noEmit` passes
